short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search any selected text on a website directly on StackOverflow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search any query on StackOverflow from another website. Drag your cursor over the text, right-click, choose "Search on StackOverflow" and done!
